para_P.title: If Lithuania secures a spot in the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024, will Georgia also make it through?
para_P.body: Assuming that Lithuania takes part in a Semi-final and is confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as qualifying for the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024, will Georgia similarly qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024? This question is answered with **Yes** if Georgia competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. It is answered with **No** for any other scenario.

question.title: Conditional on Lithuania not qualifying for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, will Georgia qualify for the Grand Final?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if the following conditions are met: 

1. Lithuania does not qualify for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Lithuania participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, this condition is not met.

2. Georgia participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final.

If both conditions are met, the question resolves as **Yes**. If the first condition is met and the second is not, it resolves as **No**. If the first condition is not met, the question resolves as N/A.

not_P.title: Conditional on Lithuania qualifying for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, will Georgia not qualify for the Grand Final?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if the following conditions are met: 

1. Lithuania qualifies for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Lithuania does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, this condition is not met.

2. Georgia participates in a Semi-final and is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final.

If both conditions are met, the question resolves as **Yes**. If the first condition is met and the second is not, it resolves as **No**. If the first condition is not met, the question resolves as N/A.

para_P.title: Assuming Lithuania fails to reach the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, can Georgia make it to the Grand Final?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if the subsequent criteria are satisfied: 

1. Lithuania does not make it to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Lithuania competes in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, this criterion is not satisfied.

2. Georgia competes in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final.

If both criteria are satisfied, the inquiry concludes with a **Yes**. If the first criterion is satisfied and the second is not, it concludes with a **No**. If the first criterion is not satisfied, the inquiry concludes as N/A.

question.title: Will Meta publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, Meta publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

not_P.title: Will Meta not publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, Meta does not publish a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

para_P.title: Is it expected that Meta will release a report detailing the findings from an independent red-team assessment of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **YES** if, on or before June 30, 2024, Meta issues a *public* report that includes the outcomes from an *external* evaluation of the safety of one of their AI models.

question.title: Will Anthropic publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, Anthropic publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

not_P.title: Will Anthropic not publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, Anthropic does not publish a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

para_P.title: Is it expected that Anthropic will release a report detailing findings from external red-teaming of their models for safety before June 30, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as **YES** if, prior to June 30, 2024, Anthropic makes available a *public* report that includes the findings from an *external* organization assessing the safety of one of their AI models.

question.title: Conditional on Anthropic publishing a report with results from external red-teaming by June 30, 2024, will Meta do the same?
question.body: Suppose the following is true: By June 30, 2024, Anthropic publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models. Given this, will Meta also publish a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models by the same date?

not_P.title: Conditional on Anthropic publishing a report with results from external red-teaming by June 30, 2024, will Meta not do the same?
not_P.body: Suppose the following is true: By June 30, 2024, Anthropic publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models. Given this, will Meta also not publish a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models by the same date?

para_P.title: If Anthropic releases a public report detailing the findings from an external red-teaming of their AI model by June 30, 2024, will Meta follow suit?
para_P.body: Assuming the following scenario holds: By June 30, 2024, Anthropic issues a *public* report that contains the results from an *external* entity assessing the safety of one of their AI models. In light of this, will Meta also issue a *public* report with findings from an *external* evaluation of the safety of one of their AI models by that same deadline?

question.title: Given Anthropic does not publish a report with external red-teaming results by June 30, 2024, will Meta publish such a report by then?
question.body:
This question explores the scenario where Anthropic does not release a public report with results from an external party red-teaming the safety of their AI models by June 30, 2024. In this context, we ask whether Meta will publish a public report with results from an external party red-teaming the safety of their AI models by the same date.

Resolution criteria:
- For Anthropic: Resolves YES if by June 30, 2024, Anthropic does not publish a public report with results from an external party red-teaming the safety of their AI models.
- For Meta: Resolves YES if by June 30, 2024, Meta publishes a public report with the results from an external party red-teaming the safety of their AI models.

not_P.title: Given Anthropic publishes a report with external red-teaming results by June 30, 2024, will Meta not publish such a report by then?
not_P.body:
This question explores the scenario where Anthropic publishes a public report with results from an external party red-teaming the safety of their AI models by June 30, 2024. In this context, we ask whether Meta will not publish a public report with results from an external party red-teaming the safety of their AI models by the same date.

Resolution criteria:
- For Anthropic: Resolves YES if by June 30, 2024, Anthropic publishes a public report with results from an external party red-teaming the safety of their AI models.
- For Meta: Resolves YES if by June 30, 2024, Meta does not publish a public report with the results from an external party red-teaming the safety of their AI models.

para_P.title: If Anthropic fails to issue a report containing external red-teaming results before June 30, 2024, will Meta issue such a report by that date?
para_P.body:
This inquiry examines the situation where Anthropic does not make a public report available that includes findings from an external red-teaming assessment of their AI models' safety by June 30, 2024. In this scenario, we are investigating whether Meta will make a public report available that includes findings from an external red-teaming assessment of their AI models' safety by the same deadline.

Resolution criteria:
- For Anthropic: Resolves YES if by June 30, 2024, Anthropic does not make a public report available that includes findings from an external red-teaming assessment of their AI models' safety.
- For Meta: Resolves YES if by June 30, 2024, Meta makes a public report available that includes findings from an external red-teaming assessment of their AI models' safety.
